title: $:/plugins/kookma/garden
author: Mohammad Rahmani
name: Tiddlywiki Garden
description: Demonstrate, practice and learn Filters and CSS in TiddlyWiki
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Garden">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Garden"/></$button>

;Tiddlywiki Garden
The garden is used to demonstrate, practice and learn, Filters, Wikitext, and CSS. Tiddlywiki garden inspired from [[CSS Zen Garden|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS_Zen_Garden]].

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Garden/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Garden
